trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKHA011_03841_AUGEBERT_000_000<tab>It's completed, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The New Nest! Ain't it a thing of beauty?
TEXT_LUCKHA011_03841_AUGEBERT_000_001<tab>We're makin' faster progress than I'd dared to hope, and it's thanks to good folk like yourself.
TEXT_LUCKHA011_03841_AUGEBERT_000_002<tab>As you know, the area's to be a residential quarter for Ishgardians, with them as lost their homes in the war given priority.
TEXT_LUCKHA011_03841_AUGEBERT_000_003<tab>That's ever been Francel's first objective in all this─makin' it so no more citizens are freezin' or starvin'.
TEXT_LUCKHA011_03841_AUGEBERT_000_004<tab>Goes without sayin' that we'll keep on needin' supplies. So keep 'em comin', eh?
